title: Synthwave - Volume 1
description: 10 synthwave themes for retrogaming arcades, platforms and memories from the 80s
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Synthwave - Volume 1" features 10 themes from the 80s featuring glitters and neon lights. Suitable for your rpg, arcade and adventures with old school analog power. Take advantage of "short" edits and multiple loops taken from every section for a total amount of 783Mb of music.


  • Neon Lights: Full length (0:1:52), 2 Short edits, 10 Loops
  • Devil: Full length (02:06), 2 Short edits, 9 Loops
  • 80s Technology 4 The New Millennium: Full length (01:34), 3 Short edits, 11 Loops
  • Escape: Full length (01:31), 3 Short edits, 11 Loops
  • Summer Party: Full length (02:18), 2 Short edits, 8 Loops
  • Black Vanilla: Full length (01:56), 2 Short edits, 10 Loops
  • Vaporwave Dreams: Full length (01:24), 2 Short edits, 9 Loops
  • Bomb: Full length (00:46), 2 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Fuel Injection: Full length (02:02), 1 Short edit, 9 Loops
  • Girlfriend: Full length (02:32), 3 Short edits, 19 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Arcade EDM - Vol.2


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.Â
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 10 Full length
  • 22 Short edits
  • 102 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 134

Number of Audio Cues: 134

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 73:46

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
